DOC.HEADLINE: EAST VALLEY FOCUS : SAN FERNANDO ; $ 908 # 259 ALLOCATED FOR QUAKE REPAIRS
DOC.TEXT: The Los Angeles County Board of Supervisors has allocated $ 908 # 259 to the city of San Fernando to help pay_for damages caused by the Jan . 17 earthquake . The funds will be used to pay_for damages to both commercial and residential properties . Of the money , $ 108 # 000 has been set_aside for the reconstruction of homes destroyed in the quake . These funds will be distributed through grants or loans . The maximum grant will be $ 5 # 000 , and the maximum loan $ 20 # 000 . Another $ 275 # 000 will be used to repair damaged homes ; $ 250 # 000 will be used for the rehabilitation of commercial properties . Damages for the January quake have been estimated at $ 2.3 billion , not including damage to federal and state properties , such_as highways or bridges , which suffered an estimated $ 18 billion in damages . JAMES ELMENDORF
